summary: The Contoso Wireless phone is a powerful smartphone with a 5.5-inch full HD display, an octa-core processor, 4GB of RAM and 64GB of storage. It also has a 12MP rear camera and an 8MP front-facing camera. It retails for $399.99 USD and comes with a one-year manufacturer’s warranty. There are also several accessories available for purchase, and customers can take advantage of discounts and promotions from time to time. Additionally, there is a 30-day money-back guarantee if customers are not satisfied with their purchase. Finally, there are other similar products available on the Contoso website.
